resources.string: \t\t“A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies…The man who never reads lives only one” - George R. R. Martin

\t\tBookStore is your destination to find all your favorite books at one place. It lists down all the details you might need regarding the books such as auhor, ratings, category etc. Add more books into your collection now!

\t\tReading books is fun, it\'s even more, when you can share it with your friends. BookStore helps you collect all the details and share it with your friends. SignUp now, find more interesting facts about BookStore!
1.Use your email id and password to login to the application
2.When you will login for the first time you will see the welcome message and these instruction
3.Once logged in, you can view the list of all added books
4.Click on the + to add a new book, which will bring the detail screen
5.Click on SAVE once you add all the relevant details
